function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Psychological impact of covid-19 outbreak on mental health","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of human and behavioral factors in wnv transmission risk assessment.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Autochthonous transmission of malaria","category":"Poor vector-borne diseases control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continued importation of malaria cases","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant time lags in traditional surveillance methods for health endpoints","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Geographic shift in infectious diseases leading to expansion of disease burden into new areas","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proactive approach to deal with drivers of infectious diseases","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of pathogen surveillance in the blood supply","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of blood products from donors infected with known or unknown pathogens represents a significant threat to the blood supply and public health.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The studied methods have the highest scores in high and very high-risk buildings","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Examination of the effect of implementing prevention methods on different types of buildings may lead to the spread of contagious diseases if the methods are not effective or if the buildings are not properly managed.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Random sampling selection","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of proper training and guidance on covid-19 exposure sources and prevention measures","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission route through stool viral shedding","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate decontamination measures for air outlets and equipment","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in air and on surfaces in healthcare environments","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"}]}
